column4: It says its not installed...but it IS running with ps ax and it was selected durign the installation of ubuntu
How do I remove something that supposedly isn't installed?
what do you want to remove?
failing that, install it again then uninstall
Will try when current installion finishes
the --force-all is a last ditch and it just goes in with the biggest hammer and beats it into submission. I strongly suggest not using it on a regular basis as it is in no way graceful
i'd recommend running: sudo apt-get -f install; sudo apt-get update afterwards to make sure everything is nice
